imdb.plot outline: Ah... hanging around peacefully all day long, watching tv, crashing on a couch, eating fat snacks and sweets as much as your stomach can handle it, Heaven! Well, that's how Rosie sees it.But unfortunately, her family and friends have a totally different vision of happiness.
imdb.title: Rosie
plot: _Rosie_ (qv) is a little pest, but that doesn't stop us finding her funny. _Rosie_ (qv)'s best friend is an imaginary sheep she calls Blackie. _Rosie_ (qv) doesn't like her neighbour. _Rosie_ (qv) makes fun of you because she makes fun of everything.::2 minutes

Ah... hanging around peacefully all day long, watching tv, crashing on a couch, eating fat snacks and sweets as much as your stomach can handle it, Heaven! Well, that's how _Rosie_ (qv) sees it.But unfortunately, her family and friends have a totally different vision of happiness.::Anonymous
